task_description: Task to schedule a doctor visit

nice_to_have: Need to ensure that the doctor has experience with my specific condition
Looking for a new doctor because of a recent move
Need to coordinate with another family member's schedule
Want to ask about alternative treatment options during the visit
deal_breakers: Concerns about the doctor's experience with my condition

technical: Need the scheduling system to have an app feature, but not sure how that works
Something modern that can send reminders, I think that's important
I heard online booking is good, but I don't really know what that means
non_technical: Looking for a doctor that everyone says is good, but also has to be available right away
Want a nice waiting room, but also prefer it to be quick and efficient
I think I need to check if they have good reviews, but I'm not sure which sites to trust

must_meet: The appointment should be scheduled within the next week, but also must allow for changes later
Must have a doctor who can see me quickly, though I'm not picky about who it is
Need to make sure the insurance is accepted, or maybe it’s not that important?
should_meet: It would be great if the doctor has experience, but I don’t really know how to check that
Should be located somewhere that feels safe, but not too far from home, I guess
The visit should fit into my schedule, but I might forget what times work best
nice_to_meet: If they have alternative treatments, that would be nice, but I'm not sure what those options are
I think it would help if the clinic had some sort of online presence, but I don’t know what to look for
It would be cool if the doctor was highly recommended, though I might just go with whoever is available
